content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mister Wang, it's a pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. How much were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. The apartment seems to be in a great location with excellent facilities nearby. Regarding the rent, I'm currently looking for something in the range of 800 Euros per month. Is this within your price range?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 800 Euros per month is quite a bit lower than what I had in mind, but I'm willing to negotiate. How long are you planning to stay? Perhaps we can work out a deal that's fair for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking to sign a long-term lease, ideally for at least two years. I believe that commitment could be beneficial for both of us. Would you be open to discussing a lower price in exchange for a longer lease term?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: A two-year lease is certainly an attractive proposition. I would be open to discussing a lower price for such a long-term commitment. How much lower were you thinking?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your flexibility, Mister Schmidt. I was thinking of a price around 900 Euros per month, considering the quality of the apartment and the convenient location. With the two-year lease, I believe this would be a fair arrangement. What do you think?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 900 Euros per month is more in line with what I had envisioned for this apartment. However, considering the current market and the fact that it's unfurnished, I might be able to meet you halfway. How about 950 Euros per month? This includes all utilities except for electricity, which you will have to pay separately. What is your opinion on this offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Mister Schmidt. 950 Euros per month, with utilities except for electricity included, is a very generous proposal. I believe this could be a good starting point for our negotiation. Would it be possible to discuss some additional amenities or services that could be provided with this rate?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Certainly, Mister Wang. I'm always open to providing additional amenities to make our tenants' stay more comfortable. What specific services or amenities would you be interested in? Perhaps we can work out a package that suits your needs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's very kind of you, Mister Schmidt. As a student, I would greatly appreciate it if we could include internet service in the monthly rent. Additionally, I would love to have access to a bicycle storage facility, as I plan to commute by bike. These would be very helpful to me.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your needs, Mister Wang. Providing internet service should not be a problem; we can certainly include that in the monthly rent. As for the bicycle storage, we do have a secure area where tenants can store their bicycles. I'm willing to offer you use of this facility at no additional cost. With these amenities in place, would you be willing to adjust your offer slightly?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Including internet service and providing access to a bicycle storage facility are very generous offers, Mister Schmidt. With these amenities included, I would be willing to adjust my offer. How about 970 Euros per month? I believe this would be a fair reflection of the value provided by the apartment and the additional services. What do you think?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 970 Euros per month is a reasonable adjustment, considering the additional amenities. I would be willing to accept this price, provided that the lease is indeed for the full two years. Once the lease is signed, we can arrange for the internet connection to be set up, and you will have access to the bicycle storage immediately. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, Mister Schmidt, I believe we have a very good agreement. I am happy with the monthly rent of 970 Euros, and I am looking forward to signing the two-year lease. Thank you for your time and for offering such a competitive rate with the additional amenities. I agree to the price of 970 Euros per month!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that, Mister Wang. We have reached an agreement on the rental price of 970 Euros per month. This includes internet service and the use of our bicycle storage facility. Once the lease is signed, we will proceed with the necessary arrangements. Is there anything else you would like to discuss or clarify before we proceed?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, Mister Schmidt, I think we have covered everything. I am very satisfied with our agreement, and I am looking forward to living in the apartment. Thank you once again for your time and effort in negotiating a fair price. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
